name: Rocket Dice
description:
The Latest in Dice Simulator Technology.

Imagine a cross between rocket league and a game where you hurl dice at various household objects. This is that.

In Rocket Dice, you play as a die who can only move by exploding. You have control over which faces of the dice explode. For example, pressing the number 6 on your keyboard will cause you to go rocketing in whatever direction the 6 on the dice was pointing away from.

Pro Tips

  • You can rocket jump.
  • Press multiple keys at the same time to move diagonally. These are called "explosion combos."
  • Rocket jumps and explosion combos can lead to some sweet trick shots.
  • It is possible to get good! Most levels can be beaten in less than ten moves. Some in less than five.

How to Play

  • You move by exploding.
  • Press numbers 1-6 on the keyboard (either numpad or top row) to explode.
  • Control camera with mouse or WASD.
  • Pause with Escape key
  • Restart level with R key
